name: Steamy Good Wintry Mushroom Soup
preparation:
1. In a large bowl, whisk together seasoning with milk; set aside.  
  2. Place mushrooms and butter in a Round Steamer. Cover; microwave on high until mushrooms start to release juices and are tender with a bite, about 5 min, stirring halfway through.  
  3. Stir in reserved seasoning mixture. Microwave on high, uncovered, for 15 min, stirring every 5 min until soup is bubby and has thickened slightly.
tips: Save prep time and buy a package of pre-sliced mushrooms. Or, mix and match—choose your favourite kinds for a medley of flavour. You’ll need a generous 1⁄2 lb (225 g) whole mushrooms.
